title: Moth of suppression

|   | An ill, greasy-looking moth, fluttering wanly in the stale air. The atmosphere in its vicinity seems to shimmer with a dull, dusty haze. Regarded as a nuisance, these creatures were driven from the surface centuries ago due to their naturally inhibitive effect on magical items in their vicinity.***“Everybody knows there is no fineness or accuracy of suppression; if you hold down one thing, you hold down the adjoining.” -Saul Bellow, \_The Adventures of Augie March |

## Useful Info

**Moths of suppression** are weak flying [insects](/List_of_insects "List of insects") with a unique disabling power. At all times, they emit a [suppression](/Suppression "Suppression") [aura](/Aura "Aura") that disables most of the effects of your magical weapons, armour, and items. Although they're fairly harmless on their own, their presence in a fight with more dangerous enemies can severely handicap you. They can be occasionally found in the [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest").

## Tips & Tricks

- When encountered in the Spider's Nest, realize that your magical sources of [poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance") will suddenly stop functioning. Consider quaffing a [potion of resistance](/Potion_of_resistance "Potion of resistance") if you don't have the resistance naturally.

## History

Moths of suppression were added in [0.12](/0.12 "0.12") and removed (along with suppression itself) in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
Moth of suppression

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

moth of suppression y 
HP 33-66
HD 9
XP 384
Speed 15
AC 0
EV 14
Will 36
Attack1 15 (bite: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Insect
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type moth, moth of suppression
Flags Flying
No stairs
No skeleton
No poly
An ill, greasy-looking moth, fluttering wanly in the stale air. The atmosphere in its vicinity seems to shimmer with a dull, dusty haze. Regarded as a nuisance, these creatures were driven from the surface centuries ago due to their naturally inhibitive effect on magical items in their vicinity.

“Everybody knows there is no fineness or accuracy of suppression; if you hold down one thing, you hold down the adjoining.”
-Saul Bellow, _The Adventures of Augie March


Useful Info

Moths of suppression are weak flying insects with a unique disabling power. At all times, they emit a suppression aura that disables most of the effects of your magical weapons, armour, and items. Although they're fairly harmless on their own, their presence in a fight with more dangerous enemies can severely handicap you. They can be occasionally found in the Spider's Nest.

Tips & Tricks

  • When encountered in the Spider's Nest, realize that your magical sources of poison resistance will suddenly stop functioning. Consider quaffing a potion of resistance if you don't have the resistance naturally.

History

Moths of suppression were added in 0.12 and removed (along with suppression itself) in 0.14.

Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Moth_of_suppression&oldid=40723"
